version.body: ###ruby version### ruby -v ruby 1.8.7 (2009-06-12 patchlevel 174) [i686-linux], MBARI 0x8770, Ruby Enterprise Edition 2009.10 ###backtrace### ss -e production -p 8888 => Booting WEBrick
